text: Let us all do a rig a jig jig!
as I was walking down the street

down the street, down the street
a very good friend I chanced to meet
Hi Ho, Hi Ho, Hi Ho!
Rig a Jig Jig and away we go
away we go, away we go!
Rig a Jig Jig and away we go
Hi Ho, Hi Ho, Hi Ho!
We clapped our hands and Stomped our feet, stomped our feet, stomped our feet
We clapped our hands and stomped our feet
Hi Ho, Hi Ho, Hi Ho!

We jumped up high and came back down,
came back down, came back down

We jumped up high and came back down
Hi Ho, Hi Ho, Hi Ho!
Rig a Jig Jig and away we go,

away we go, away we go
Rig a Jig Jig and away we go
Hi Ho, Hi Ho, Hi Ho!
We climbed on a train and tooted the horn, tooted the horn, tooted the horn

We climbed on a train and tooted the horn
Hi Ho, Hi Ho, Hi Ho!
Kissed my ma and hugged my pa,

hugged my pa, hugged my pa
Kissed my ma and hugged my pa
Hi Ho, Hi Ho, Hi Ho!
Rig a Jig Jig and away we go
away we go, away we go
Rig a Jig Jig and away we go
Hi Ho, Hi Ho, Hi Ho!
